SCENE_SETTINGS=1.description: Property. This message defines the components that make up the PlanningScene message. The values can be used as a bitfield to specify which parts of the PlanningScene message are of interest Scene name, model name, model root

ROBOT_STATE=2.description: Property. Joint values of the robot state

ROBOT_STATE_ATTACHED_OBJECTS=4.description: Property. Attached objects (including geometry) for the robot state

WORLD_OBJECT_NAMES=8.description: Property. The names of the world objects

WORLD_OBJECT_GEOMETRY=16.description: Property. The geometry of the world objects

TRANSFORMS=64.description: Property. The maintained list of transforms

LINK_PADDING_AND_SCALING=256.description: Property. The default link padding and link scaling

components.description: Property. Bitfield combining options indicated above
